name: Mahindra XUV 3XO
description: The price of Mahindra XUV 3XO, a 5 seater Compact SUV, ranges from Rs. 7.49  - 15.49 Lakh. It is available in 25 variants, with engine options ranging from 1197 to 1497 cc and a choice of 2 transmissions: Manual and Automatic. XUV 3XO comes with 6 airbags. Mahindra XUV 3XO is available in 16 colours. Users have reported a mileage of 18.06 to 21.2 kmpl for XUV 3XO.
